post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
You might want to check with Mr. Oh.
I think he worked on a similar thing about a year ago.



>one of rquirment of the currnet project I am wokring on is create drop down style calendar. the calendar should able to recognzie user's keystrokes ( down arrow and up arrow keystrokes) and add or substract day, month, or year.
>Is there any third party component? In case, I have to create my own control, is there any function or way to recognize which key user presses?
>
>thank you,
>
>
post.title: [re] ASP.NET keystroke
